verses.1: Ka ta aw, nang na hih leh Khris Jesu tawh i kipawl manin i ngah hehpihna hangin thahatin om in.
verses.2: Mi tampiteʼ theihin ka thuhilh, na zak sa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilh sawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in.
verses.3: Khris Jesuʼ galkap hoih hihna tawh thuak dingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in.
verses.4: Galkap a sem lai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theih nadingin na sem ahih manin tualsung miteʼ nasep tawh thuah khawm lo hi.
verses.5: Kimawl kidemna ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah thei lo hi.
verses.6: Hahkat takin lo a kho pa in anlak hun ciangin a tam pen a ngah dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
verses.7: Topa in thu khempeuh na theih nadingin hong huh ding ahih manin hih ka thugente khempeuh limtakin na ngaihsun in.
verses.8: Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna sungah ka gen mah bangin Davidʼ suan, sihna panin a kithosak Jesu Khris na na phawk in.
verses.9: Ama hangin a kingah Lungdamna Thu ka hilh manin gimna ka thuak a, mi that bangin sikkol hong kibulh hi. Pasianʼ thu ahihleh sikkol kibulh thei lo hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih manin Pasianʼ teel mite in zong Khris Jesu hangin hotkhiatna le tawntung minthanna a ngahkhawm theih nadingun amauteʼ hangin na khempeuh ka thuak hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih manin, “Amah tawh i sih khawm le amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi.
verses.12: Eite in gimna i thuak paisuak zawh leh amah tawh i uk khawm ding hi. Amah i nial leh amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi.
verses.13: Amah le amah kikhem thei lo ahih manin eite i citak kei zongin amah citak veve ding hi,” ci-in a kigenna thu man mahmah hi.
verses.14: Na mite thu kinialin a kitot loh nadingun Pasianʼ mai ah thupi takin na hilh khol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek ahi hi.
verses.15: Pasianʼ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasianʼ pahtakna na ngah theih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.
verses.16: Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu gina lo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiseelnate na pelh in.
verses.17: Tua bangin amauʼ thugennate in mite siasak a, tua banga thugente lakah Hymenaias le Filetas a kihel uh hi.
verses.18: Thuman lampi panin amaute pial khin uh a, thawhkikna thu pen a beisa thu hi ta hi, ci-in thu um mi pawl khat lungmangsak uh hi.
verses.19: Ahi zongin Pasian in a phuh sa sutpi kilok zo ngei lo ding hi. Tua sutpi tungah, “Topa in ama mi kua teng hiam cih thei hi,” cihna le, “Topa tawh kipawl ing, a ci peuhmah in mawhna su kha lo ding hi,” cihna kigelh hi.
verses.20: Inn lian khat peuhpeuh sungah umlebeel a nam tuamtuam a om hi. Pawl khatte ngun tawh kibawl a, pawl khatte kham tawh kibawl a, pawl khatte sing tawh, pawl khatte tungman tawh kibawl hi. Pawl khatte a thupi diakin zat theih ding, pawl khatte nisimin a mawk mawkin zat theih ding ahi hi.
verses.21: Mi khatpeuh a hoih lo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nakleh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte ah amah kizang ding hi.
verses.22: Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoih lote pelh inla, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neih theih nadingun hanciam khawm un.
verses.23: Thu kihai seelna, thei lo pi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a piansak lamtak na theih sa ahi hi.
verses.24: Topaʼ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo dinga, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuak zawhna nei-in,
verses.25: thunem tawh a langteʼ hoih lohna a puah theite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei dinga, thuman thutak hong thei-in,
verses.26: Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta kha thei ding uh hi.
